title._content: Image taken from page 5 of 'Sly's King's Arms and Royal Hotel, Lancaster. [Prefixed are three hand-bills announcing that a sale of “all the valuable and historical contents” will take place in April, 1877.]'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Sly's King's Arms and Royal Hotel, Lancaster. [Prefixed are three hand-bills announcing that a sale of “all the valuable and historical contents” will take place in April, 1877.]" Author: SLY, Joseph. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10347.cc.2.(13.)" Page: 5 Place of Publishing: Lancaster Date of Publishing: 1875 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003409270 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
